mapper.select: select user.*,role.role_code as roleCode,role.role_name as roleName,user.create_id as creator,user.update_id as updator, (select name from user where user.id = creator) as createUser, (select name from user where user.id = creator) as updateUser from liepin.user left join liepin.role on user.role_id = role.id where role.dlt = 'NO' and user.id = #{id}
